name: Cat's Cradle (itch)
description:
Explore the forest as a young girl trying to find her family.

She's trained in combat, and has skills to show off!~

A solo dream passion project.

This game is in active development. Expect bugs, and unfinished animations.

Demo does not yet have an intro, ending, and will be a dead end upon reaching the river. (Crossing next update!)

Still testing combat, so nothing happens upon reaching 0 hp.

Next update we'll be exploring the 'dead forest' where things get a little spooky.

Current playtime: 5 minutes

--- Current Features ---

  • Simple action combat
  • 12 single screen maps
  • 3 enemy types

--- Controls ---

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • A - Run
  • S - Swipe (Tap or Hold)
  • D - Dodge
  • Q - Zoom In
  • W - Zoom Out
  • E - Harvest
  • Esc - Exit/ Enter Full Screen

--- Upcoming Features ---

  • 3 playable characters
  • Unlockable skills
  • NPC Interactions
  • Many maps
  • Many enemy types
  • Boss battles
  • A complete story
  • Music from several skillful artists
  • See roadmap for more details!~

--- Extra Milestone Features ---

  • 3 extra playable upperclassmen characters
  • Alternate costumes
  • Fishing minigame

--- Known Bugs ---

  • Top layer may jitter during scene transition
  • Transitioning scenes while zoomed in will awkwardly revert to default camera
